mapper.select: select * from cuitrwx.appointment where id = #{id} and status = "2" or status = "3";
mapper.insert: insert into cuitrwx.appointment(id, begintime, endtime, status, illustrate, createTime)values(#{id},#{begintime},#{endtime}, #{status},#{illustrate},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update cuitrwx.appointment set status = 0 where id = #{id}
